result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. CHRISTOPHER L MCCLOUD JR

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for CHRISTOPHER L MCCLOUD JR
Current: 123 N Washington St, Berlin, WI 54923 United States  (Effective: 11-01-2022)
Prior: 123 W Washington St, Berlin, WI 54923 United States
Second appearance on November 22, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

11:19 AM Defendant CHRISTOPHER L MCCLOUD JR in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls 22CF197 and 22CF173. For 22CF197 - Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  ADA makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 signature bond and conditions of: Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant waives the time limits. Court will set for Status of Attorney for both cases on November 22, 2022 at 2:45 PM. 


Court adjourned at 11:22 AM.

ADDRESS INFO for CHRISTOPHER L MCCLOUD JR
Current: 123 W Washington St, Berlin, WI 54923 United States  (Effective: 10-31-2022)
Prior: 1406 Creek Rd #11, West Bend, WI 53090

1:06 PM Defendant CHRISTOPHER L MCCLOUD JR in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court questions defendant if he's willing to proceed with the prelim without counsel or if he'd be willing to waive the time limits so counsel can be present for the prelim. Defendant waives time limits so he has time to get an attorney. Court notes defendant has other charges filed by the DA's office. Court notes he has not yet signed the arrest warrant for the defendant's new case, 22CF197. Court schedules a mandatory appearance for the defendant on November 1, 2022 at 11:00 am. If the defendant appears at that court date, the Court will take care of the warrant.

Court adjourned at 1:09 PM.
Status hearing scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

1:02 PM Defendant CHRISTOPHER L MCCLOUD JR appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Scott Nelson appeared by video for the defendant. Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant objects to having this hearing by zoom. 1:03 PM OFF THE RECORD 

Court recalls 1:30 PM. Defendant CHRISTOPHER L MCCLOUD JR in court, in custody.  Attorney Scott Nelson appears by zoom. Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Nelson confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading and requests a preliminary hearing. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. ADA makes bond recommendation. Atty Nelson makes bond recommendation. Court sets bond at $500 cash bond and conditions of: Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Attorney Nelson states the defendant is not eligible for the public defender's office. Defendant does not waive the time limits. Court will set for Preliminary Hearing for November 1, 2022 at 11:00 AM and Status of Prelim October 31, 2022 at 1:00 PM. 

Court adjourned at 1:36 AM

Court quashes warrant.

10:03 AM Defendant CHRISTOPHER L MCCLOUD JR not in court.  Attorney Matthew Steven McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court orders a warrant - forthwith.

Court adjourned at 10:03 AM
